General.Name: ID Logistics Group SA
General.Description: ID Logistics Group SA provides contract logistics services in France and internationally. It provides warehousing and value-added, transport and flow organization, and supply chain optimization services. The company also offers co-packing and site automation services. In addition, it provides turnkey project delivery and e-commerce solutions; and operates approximately 365 sites across 17 countries. The company serves customers in the FMCG, e-commerce, high-tech, cosmetics and fragrance, fashion, industrial, and retail sectors. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Orgon, France

7.Name: Mr. Javier  Echenique
